titleStmt.title: A funerall oratyon made the xiiij. day of Ianuary by Iohn Hoper, the yere of our saluation, 1549. vpon the texte wrytyne in the Reuelatyone of Sayncte Iohne. Ca. 14.
titleStmt.author: Hooper, John, d. 1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [S. Mierdman for] Edwarde Whitechurch at the signe of the Sonne in flet strete,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sonne in flet strete
